wikipedia_page.main: James Henry Mussen Campbell, 1st Baron Glenavy  (4 April 1851 – 22 March 1931) was an Irish lawyer, politician in the British Parliament and later in the Oireachtas of the Irish Free State. He was also Lord Chancellor of Ireland.
